陯字的基本解释

陯
lún
山阜塌陷。
古山名。

陯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lún］
［《廣韻》力迍切，平諄，來。］
亦作“埨2”。
(1)山阜崩塌下陷。也作“淪”。泛指沦没。
(2)山名。
[②]［lùn］
［《集韻》盧困切，去圂，來。］
坎陷。

陯字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陯； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1353第05
【唐韻】【集韻】?盧昆切，音崘。【說文】山阜陷也。　又【廣韻】力迍切【集韻】龍春切，?音倫。義同。【玉篇】亦作淪。　又【集韻】盧困切，音論。同埨。坎陷也。

陯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
陯字的起名意思

暂无。

Phoenix
Basic explanation of words
Phoenix
lún
Mountain Fu collapsed.
Ancient mountain name.
Phoenix
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lún］
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, smooth, come. ]
Also known as "埨2".
(1) Shanfu collapsed and subsided. Also referred to as "depraved". Refers to degeneration in general.
(2) The name of the mountain.
[②]［lùn］
["Ji Yun" Lu Kunqie, go to 圂, come. ]
Bumps.
Phoenix
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[戌集] [Fu Character Department] 　陯; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1353 No. 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Lu Kunqie, Yinwei. [Said the text] Shanfu is also sinking.　[Guangyun] Li Yiqie【Jiyun】Longchunqie,? Yinlun. The same meaning. [Jade articles] also made depravity.　[Jiyun] Lu Kunqie, on sound. The same. The trap is also.
Phoenix
